name: Laser Kitty Pow Pow
description:
*** MOST ACTION PACKED ARCADE ON THE APP STORE! ***
Cute? Maybe. Fast? Sure! Action-packed? You bet. Crazy? You won't believe your eyes! Laser Kitty Pow Pow is fast paced, arcade-like, laser infused, crystal boosted, ninja exploding and kitty flying game that challenges the definition of ARCADE ACTION on the App Store. Are you ready?

* Face more enemies than the highest number you know.
* Enjoy fast, easy to jump in and crazy satisfying action.
* Unlock, use and upgrade special Cat-laser powers.
* Meet Tim the Tailor and craft super cute and powerful Cats.
* Play adaptive challenge system and face new enemies at your own pace.
* Lose yourself in sensory-overloading retro visual style.

Get your favourite Kitty and defend the world against evil!
publishers: ARS THANEA ROZBICKI SPOLKA KOMANDYTOWO AKCYJNA
